title: Make Zac playable again.
body: Just make him so that he can contest his own buffs and even fight for scuttle easier. You can nerf his cc and buff his damage a bit. Just do something to make him more playable, please. I really love this champ but almost every game, I can't get level 3 before getting invaded...

replies.body: Just revert him. I want his old ult back, it was way more fun than what he has now.
Not gonna happen bc if he's viable enough to jg without his team having to  babysit him till 6 then he might be played in pro, and that's illegal

Honestly his jg clear is not strong, even among tank jgs it's pretty average until cinderhulk. Like I'd say sej, amumu, cho, and trundle have better clears than zac

And if he cleared on the level of trundle he would be back to pick ban. Zac has garbage tier clear because he has THE strongest ganks in the entire game. He can gank mid from like 12 different spots after level 5. Wards mean nothing to that champion because he can and WILL just gank around them. 

Getting ganked as red side bot from my own tri brush when I'm still like 200 units away from my tower range is really fun and I hope he comes back to the meta. /s
every game again? you mean right after the rework? well I'd like a revert
Bring back Let's Bounce. The new ult is just so boring compared to it.

Or at least let me refund all the skins I have for him. I played him before rework when you could actually build him AP and destroy people. Y'know, when you could have FUN playing him. Now he just feels like a forgettable, brain-dead tank with no options to switch up his playstyle.
Zac is still in a great spot with plenty of outplay opportunity I consistently do well with him in plat.
His ult is impossible for me to understand.

Imo hes fine, yes he struggles against early junglers but he has a insane mid/lategame in return. Just got to be Creative with early routes. If you know the enemy will invade your buff just get his and aboid him. (Source almost 800k Mastery Points Zac Main in Low Diamond)
